summary: This bill, known as the Iceland Commercial and Economic Leadership for Arctic and National Development Act (ICELAND Act), aims to allow Icelandic nationals to be eligible for E1 and E2 nonimmigrant visas, the same visas as nonimmigrant traders and investors, if the Icelandic government provides reciprocal treatment to U.S. nationals. The bill modifies the Immigration and Nationality Act to include Iceland under qualifying foreign states for these visa types.
